entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Tasiujaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:07 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 24.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 41 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 41 this evening and minus 52 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 31.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 31. Wind chill minus 52 in the morning and minus 45 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 33. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
